name: Video Game Collector
description:
Video Game Collector is a game about collecting games.

Sounds simple right? But what if you had to rescue monsters, meet magical beasts and feed a hungry princess to do it?

This was a passion project that we threw ourselves into, but sadly due to some unfortunate circumstances we sort of fell off active development.

So please feel free to enjoy what is there, find games, look at art work, and let us know what you think.

Thanks
